description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Merrijig, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Pinnacle Valley Apartment-Style Escape near Mount Buller with Onsite Dining & Spa
hotels.description: Let the allure of Victoria's High Country enchant you with a stay at this serene countryside resort. Located in the heart of the Australian Alps, the pristine property offers a unique blend of adventure and relaxation. Delight in the nearby ski fields, cycling trails and golf courses, or explore the region's acclaimed wineries and gourmet food producers. When you're not out adventuring, savour local flavours at the onsite Peaks Restaurant, take a dip in the heated pool or relax in your comfortable, alpine-inspired studio or apartment. With tennis, basketball and volleyball courts on site and mini golf for all birdie lovers, you won't run out of entertainment options. And don't forget to indulge in relaxing therapies at the onsite spa.

seo.title: Hôtels à Merrijig - Australie Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trouvez les meilleurs hôtels à Merrijig, Australia avec des offres exclusives. Réservez votre escapade parfaite avec jusqu'à 60% de réduction.
